summary: An email from July 9, 2019, requesting assistance from a Customs and Border Protection (CBP) contact to obtain flight manifests and surveillance video for Jeffrey Epstein's arrivals at Teterboro Airport. The request specifically seeks passenger details and mentions a concern for identifying minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email requests flight manifests for when he flew into Teterboro Airport, including details about his travel companions.

events.title: Initial CBP Contact
events.description: An initial contact was made with a Customs and Border Protection (CBP) official, as referenced by a prior email sent on this date.

events.title: Formal Request for Epstein Flight Data
events.description: A formal email request is sent to a CBP contact seeking flight manifests and surveillance video for Jeffrey Epstein's arrivals at Teterboro Airport.

keyFacts: An investigation in July 2019 was actively seeking flight manifests for Jeffrey Epstein's arrivals at Teterboro Airport.
The request specifically asked for details on Epstein's travel companions, including names and dates of birth.
The investigator expressed interest in obtaining surveillance video, with a particular concern for identifying if any companions were minors.
